孒字的基本解释

孒
jué
古同“孓”。

孒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》居月切，入月，見。］
［《廣韻》九勿切，入物，見。］
［《廣韻》居悚切，上腫，見。］
亦作“孒1”。
(1)无左臂。
(2)见“孑孓”。

孒字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【子字部】　孒； 康熙笔画：3； 页码：页277第08
【唐韻】【集韻】?居月切，音厥。【說文】無左臂形。【博雅】孑孒，短也。　又【廣韻】居竦切，音拱孑孒，井中小蟲。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?九勿切，音?。義同。◎按《字彙》作孓，非。今改正。

考證：〔【博雅】孑孓，短也。〕　謹照原文孓改孒。

孒字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guang Yun" cuts into the moon, enters the moon, see you. ]
["Guangyun" Nine do not cut, enter the object, see. ]
["Guangyun" is horrified and swollen on the top, see you. ]
Also known as "Card 1".
(1) No left arm.
(2) See "孑孓".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 1] [Sub Word Department] 　孒; Kangxi Strokes: 3; Page Number: Page 277 08
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Juyue cut, sound Jue. [Speaking text] No left arm shape. 【Bo Ya】It’s so short.　[Guangyun] The house is cut, the sound is arched, the worm in the well.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Nine do not cut, sound?. The same meaning. ◎According to "Words" as a nucleus, no. Correct now.
